short_summary: The Correctional Service of Canada, Springhill Institutions require educational and library services from one of four unique areas, [see below for more]
description: The Correctional Service of Canada, Springhill Institution has a requirement for educational and library services. The services will be carried out by contract teachers and library technicians who provide education and library programs to inmates at Springhill Institution. The contract will be carried out over a period of one (1) year.
